english_example_sentence: You always produce quality products in this factory.
russian_example_sentence: Вы всегда производите качественные продукты на этой фабрике.
turkish_example_sentence: Siz her zaman bu fabrikada kaliteli ürünler üretirsiniz.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Siz her zaman bu fabrikada kaliteli ürünler ______.
